Container.Name: Homepage
Container.Overview:
Homepage is a start page for your browser.
Key Features: - Fast! The entire site is statically generated at build time, so you can expect instant load times. - Minimal! The homepage is designed to be as minimal as possible, so you can focus on what matters. - Customizable! You can customize the homepage to your liking. There are 21 built in themes to choose from. You can add your own background image as well! - Docker Integration! Easily grab container statuses by using Docker labels. - Service Integrations! - Sonarr, Radarr, Readarr, Prowlarr, Bazarr, Lidarr, Emby, Jellyfin, Tautulli (Plex), Ombi, Overseerr, Jellyseerr, Jackett, NZBGet, SABnzbd, ruTorrent, Transmission, qBittorrent, Portainer, Traefik, Speedtest Tracker, PiHole, AdGuard Home, Nginx Proxy Manager, Gotify, and more!
